ConditionDescription: THIS BEAUTIFUL PIN HAS BEEN IN STORAGE AND IS IN VERY GOOD CONDITION.  THE WATCH JUST GOT A NEW BATTERY AND THERE ARE TWO RHINESTONES MISSING AS YOU CAN SEE IN THE THIRD PICTURE.
Title: Kirk Folly Signed Balloon With The Moon, Stars and Danding Watch Pin
Description: This beautiful balloon brooch has the moon and stars with pink crystals in them. Dangling for the stars is a watch with a new battery. Dangling for the balloon with crystals are different colored hearts and a mini air balloon.
